fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Put on a cute show at a target's house. All non-Pale Moon abilities on them will not take place.
- Put on a very cute show during the day. The day phase will end immediately without a hanging. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - During the PMCS, your first ability also roleblocks your target. Additionally, you learn everyone who your ability affected. You gain a charge of your second ability.
